mapper.select: SELECT apply.apply_idx, apply.user_idx, apply.channel_idx, apply.apply_step, member.member_nick, member.member_image FROM apply INNER JOIN member ON apply.user_idx = member.user_idx AND apply.channel_idx = member.channel_idx WHERE apply.channel_idx = 1 AND apply.apply_step = 'applying';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply VALUES( default, #{userIdx}, #{channelIdx}, default, 'applying' )
